body:
So the plot that i think understand was like this
At first the author seems just wants to make a doujinshi where you bang a sleeping girl on train, and then somehow the author wants to make a harem story but then because the story feels so random and non sense so he add a little bit netorare sparkle.
Its still far from the climax so yeah lets just hope the author get tired of making netorare stuff
So it was actually hentai?

Top-tier art and decent story
Too bad mc turned away from harem route
Good shit, just like brawling go!
Still no translation? Hello shinigami-san I've come to bargain
800 pgs wtf
English version when ? (╥﹏╥)
I really liked this until he decided to go after the stepsister, disgusting af
Boo why other guys fucking his woman's? Fuckyou! I was hoping that he will monopolize the girls he already fucked. Anyways 800 chapters wtf? It's beyond good nonetheless.
holy 800 page
bro, every single fucking chapter is a huge W, on god this a 11/10
I will ask this even if I die after writing this. Please someone translate this. It looks like a manga with good plot but hentai

"I don't wanna be horny anymore, I just want to be happy"
- this guy definitely
third long manga i see wtf..haha
Waiting for subbed
Looks like the story is deeper than I expected, thanks for adding details tho @DrinksandDame.
@TakashiSenpai15 Sadly no. not even a single chapter so no one's probably working on it. I only know the story cuz I can read japanese.
@DrinksandDame hey, does this manga have english version??

really good story. Im guessing this manga is reaching its final arc now. But considering that some chapters are sometimes made just for oneshot girl fcking, this might get even longer. Also, MC hasn't fcked with his stepsister/girlfriend yet so there's that to look forward to.

New chapter comes from Comic Ananga Ranga. They don't come with every new release though. I also don't know if anyone would ever decide to translate this.

other goddess is some goddess of love. 

Basically, the story goes like this. MC is a man of no desire. Jizo goddess cursed him with desire for lust, he ends up fcking with several girls. Her intention was to enable him to look for a partner in life. After fcking girls left and right, he finally decided to go on a dating site once again. He found a really good girl but she ended being a bitch for money. MC is now even mega depressed. From here, story goes towards MC developing love interest to his stepsister, and it was mutual so they started dating. Now, the two goddesses are supposed to leave MC since they've accomplished their goal, but Jizo goddess has grown attached to MC so she stayed. One day,she wants to fck with MC as usual but he can't since curse is now gone and he has a girl he likes. Apparently, Jizo has been very lonely with no one paying her any attention for years. The rejection made her depressed which led to her cursing (unintentionally?) random girls with horniness.

I cant remember much of the details since I first read this months ago, but pretty much the summary Noxsphere gave is decent enough to follow through the story. I have a few corrections though, with some being VERY IMPORTANT. 
Important: MC actually originally had no ambitions, no desire in life. He dated girls but he just can't seem to be attached to any of em. The "curse" on him was actually sort of a "good thing", since he finally has a desire (for lust though). But actually, the goddess really just wanted to make him use that lust to be able to look for an actual partner so he won't die alone and live a happy life. That's why she can't remove the curse even after meeting each other in person.

Minor corrections: The statue is a jizo statue(just search what it is). The one he started dating was from a blind date. Girl ended being someone who dated him just for the luxury treats though. The young long black haired girl is his stepsister (his mother remarried). The-
holy moly 800 pages... time flies fast i only seen it having 1-3 chapters before
Oh so that’s how the story goes, thank you for the explanation.

Feelings for him and that clouded her judgement a bit on continuing with whatever she did to him, and the other goddess.. she came from a book? A modern version of the forgotten goddess? Not really sure tbh but yeah at the end we kind of start to see that some girls who passed by him got the same thing as him and ended up doing or getting done something to them by others and the school is hella full of all those girls he violated at first, at least this is my take on it, i wish for a translation but jesus christ i can only imagine how much work it would take to do it, anyways if you read this idk what you are doing with you life .-. have a nice one.

Jesus makuritsu, this was a whole trip, so far what i think the story is about without knowing what it says, an old forgotten goddess got awoken when he kicked the statue, he got some sort of curse that makes him extremely horny with certain girls he sees? He then proceeds to violate them and then proceeds on with his day sort of scare and wondering why thats happening to him? I think thats how it goes, then that he starts dating someone from work and she ends up with another dude somehow, he becomes depressed, theres also that one girl that came into hes life.. step sister? Or maybe a niece of the father?, Well anyways she sort of becomes main girl, now about the two goddesses.. he ends up meeting the old forgotten goddess and of course hes mad that she made him like that but it seems like she did it for a reason? I think she got lonely being stuck in the statue but that would be she was not awoken but release, im not really sure on that front, it seems like she started getting some-
